PURCHASES.name: Purchases
PURCHASES.description: Top-ups are purchases made in the game to obtain Genesis Crystals.

COMMISSIONS.name: Commissions
COMMISSIONS.description: Commissions are daily tasks that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

BLESSING_OF_THE_WELKIN_MOON.name: Blessing of the Welkin Moon
BLESSING_OF_THE_WELKIN_MOON.description: Blessing of the Welkin Moon is a premium system that rewards players by logging in daily.

BATTLE_PASS.name: Battle Pass
BATTLE_PASS.description: Battle Pass is a system that allows players to obtain rewards by completing challenges.

SPIRAL_ABYSS.name: Spiral Abyss
SPIRAL_ABYSS.description: Spiral Abyss is a special type of domain where players defeat enemies and try challenges.

ADVENTURE_RANK.name: Adventure Rank
ADVENTURE_RANK.description: Adventure Rank is a system that increases based on the player's experience.

ACHIEVEMENTS.name: Achievements
ACHIEVEMENTS.description: Achievements are task or challenges that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

CHECK_IN.name: Check-In
CHECK_IN.description: Check-In is a system that allows players to obtain rewards by logging in daily.

TRUST_RANK.name: Trust Rank
TRUST_RANK.description: Trust Rank is a system within the Serenitea Pot that allows players to obtain rewards.

PROMO_CODES.name: Promo Codes
PROMO_CODES.description: Promo Codes are limited-time codes that can be redeemed in exchange for rewards.

MAIL.name: Mail
MAIL.description: Mail is a system that allows players to receive messages from players and the developer.

QUESTS.name: Quests
QUESTS.description: Quests are series of tasks that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

TUTORIALS.name: Tutorials
TUTORIALS.description: Tutorials are a series of gameplay instructions that introduce new game mechanics.

DISCOVERY.name: Discovery
DISCOVERY.description: Discovery refers to the act of discovering Domains, Waypoints and Statues of Teyvat.

CHESTS.name: Chests
CHESTS.description: Chests are objects that can be found all throughout Teyvat.

DOMAINS.name: Domains
DOMAINS.description: Domains are special areas that allow the player to test their skills against enemies.

STATUE_OF_THE_SEVEN.name: Statue of The Seven
STATUE_OF_THE_SEVEN.description: Statues of The Seven are structures found around all of Teyvat.

ADVENTURER_HANDBOOK.name: Adventurer Handbook
ADVENTURER_HANDBOOK.description: The Adventurer Handbook is a book, tracks achievements and progress and offers rewards.

FROSTBEARING_TREE.name: Frostbearing Tree
FROSTBEARING_TREE.description: The Frostbearing Tree is an offering system and point of interest located in Dragonspine.

LUMENSTONE_ASCENSION.name: Lumenstone Ascension
LUMENSTONE_ASCENSION.description: The Lumenstone system is an offering system based in the The Chasm, Liyue.

SACRED_SAKURA.name: Sacred Sakura
SACRED_SAKURA.description: The Sacred Sakura is an offering system and point of interest located in Narukami Island.

TREE_OF_DREAMS.name: Tree of Dreams
TREE_OF_DREAMS.description: The Tree of Dreams is an offering system and point of interest located in Vanarana, Sumeru.

AMRITA_POOL.name: Amrita Pool
AMRITA_POOL.description: The Amrita Pool is an offering system and point of interest located in Vourukasha Oasis.

FOUNTAIN_OF_LUCINE.name: Fountain of Lucine
FOUNTAIN_OF_LUCINE.description: The Fountain of Lucine is an offering system located in the Court of Fontaine.

CHARACTER_ASCENSION.name: Character Ascension
CHARACTER_ASCENSION.description: Character Ascension is a system that allows players to level up their characters.

SURVEYS.name: Surveys
SURVEYS.description: Surveys are questionnaires completed to obtain rewards.

GENESIS_CRYSTALS_EXCHANGE.name: Genesis Crystals Exchange
GENESIS_CRYSTALS_EXCHANGE.description: Genesis Crystals are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

PRIMOGEMS_EXCHANGE.name: Primogem Exchange
PRIMOGEMS_EXCHANGE.description: Primogems are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

STARGLITTER_EXCHANGE.name: Starglitter Exchange
STARGLITTER_EXCHANGE.description: Starglitter is a currency obtained by exchanging Primogems in Paimon's Bargains.

STARDUST_EXCHANGE.name: Stardust Exchange
STARDUST_EXCHANGE.description: Stardust is a currency obtained by exchanging Primogems in Paimon's Bargains.

INTERTWINED_FATE_WISH.name: Intertwined Fate Wish
INTERTWINED_FATE_WISH.description: Intertwined Fate is a Fate used to wish in the Character Event Banner and Weapon Event Banner.

ACQUAINT_FATE_WISH.name: Acquaint Fate Wish
ACQUAINT_FATE_WISH.description: Acquaint Fate is a Fate used to wish in the Standard Banner and Beginner Banner.

PRIMOGEMS.name: Primogems
PRIMOGEMS.description: Primogems are a premium currency in Genshin Impact.

GENESIS_CRYSTALS.name: Genesis Crystals
GENESIS_CRYSTALS.description: Genesis Crystals are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

ACQUAINT_FATE.name: Acquaint Fate
ACQUAINT_FATE.description: Acquaint Fate is a Fate item used to perform wishes.

INTERTWINED_FATE.name: Intertwined Fate
INTERTWINED_FATE.description: Intertwined Fate is a Fate item used to perform wishes.
